entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 12:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
